metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32746 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in the Samba AD LDAP server. The AD DC database audit logging module can access LDAP message values freed by a preceding database module, resulting in a use-after-free issue. This issue is only possible when modifying certain privileged attributes, such as userAccountControl.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-32746` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldb-tools - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libldb2 - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
python3-ldb - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

ctdb - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libnss-winbind - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libpam-winbind - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libsmbclient - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libwbclient0 - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
python3-samba - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
registry-tools - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-ad-dc - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-ad-provision - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-common - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-common-bin - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-dsdb-modules - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-libs - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-testsuite - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-vfs-modules - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
smbclient - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
winbind - 2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> combined patches are in bug 15096 Fixing this in Ubuntu 18.04 LTS would require substantial code backports. We will not be fixing this issue in Ubuntu 18.04 LTS. In environments where this is of concern, we recommend updating to a more recent Ubuntu version, or disabling AD DC database audit logging if this is not passible.

criterions.comment: samba package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
samba package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.16.4+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
